form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  hiddenInput: string
  control: string
  rating(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the rating. Useful for composition.

name.description: The name attribute of the rating element (used in forms).

onHoverChange.description: Function to be called when the rating value is hovered.

onValueChange.description: Function to be called when the rating value changes.

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

clearValue.description: Clears the value of the rating group

getItemState.description: Returns the state of a rating item

hoveredValue.description: The value of the currently hovered rating

isHovering.description: Whether the rating group is being hovered

setValue.description: Sets the value of the rating group

size.description: The maximum value of the rating group

sizeArray.description: The array of rating values. Returns an array of numbers from 1 to the max value.

value.description: The current value of the rating group
